name: VCTR (v1.2)
description:
VCTR (shorthand for Vector) is a first-person runner game with randomly generated terrain. As forward speed is built up over time, your only manual movement options are left and right. Jump over walls and slide under lasers as you make it your goal to reach the distance requirement you select. Don't fall off, either!

This game is also compatible with PS4 controllers.

Controls:
A/D Keys // Arrow keys // PS4 left joystick: Move
Z Key / PS4 X Button: Jump
C Key / PS4 Square Button: Slide
P Key / PS4 Options Button: Pause
Shift keys / PS4 back shoulder buttons: Set difficulty

VERSION HISTORY:

v1.0 (July 28, 2019):
Base release.

v1.1 (July 31, 2019):
- Various obstacle collision fixes.
- Various menu UI fixes.
- Can now change the difficulty setting in the menu.
- Can now pause in the middle of gameplay.
- Adjusted the ground material to improve view distance.
- Light rotation settings have been adjusted.

v1.2 (August 1, 2019):
- Added a new difficulty setting: Master (1,000m).
